sections.title: Our Story
content: Small, honest beginnings. Steady, sustained growth. A circle of ever-expanding, committed stakeholders and ever-growing loyal customer base, making us today one of the most trusted brands across demographics in the country.

From a modest home-grown venture to a brand with cutting-edge production units, state-of- the-art machinery and path-breaking research and development tools, the SUNRISE journey is the stuff of not only stories, but of legend.

sections.title: Our Research and Development
content: Our philosophy is not to rest on our laurels but to keep bringing to the consumer and the market newer and newer innovations and better and better quality. Our Research and Development team is constantly engaged in maintaining the SUNRISE edge in manufacturing the best quality products through top-notch research that focuses on adopting indigenous innovations-driven processes.

sections.title: Our Product Basket
content: The wide range of products include Blended spices like Chana Masala, Pav Bhaji Masala, Tadka Masala, Sambar Masala, Meat Masala, Biryani Pulav Masala, Paneer Butter Masala, Shahi Garam Masala, Generic spices like Turmeric Powder, Chilli Powder, Coriander Powder, Cumin Powder, Mustard Powder, Hing, Mewarams Papad and many more.

sections.title: Our Promise
content: For us, Quality is God. And God, they say, is in the details.
It is this no-compromise attitude towards quality that gives us the confidence to promise you the best and bring you the purest.
